original_title: T I M E Q U A K E (2.0)
overview: "T I M E Q U A K E (2.0)" explores the relationship between our bodies, our devices and time; the lag and labour of our efforts to stay connected and keep hitting "refresh." Have we acquired a new sense of time, or does time make any sense at all? We are literally left to our own devices.
title: T I M E Q U A K E (2.0)
